original_text: And it had been revealed to him by the Holy Spirit that he would not see death before he had seen the Lord's Christ.
korean_text: 그가 주의 그리스도를 보기 전에는 죽지 아니하리라 하는 성령의 지시를 받았더니

sentences.original_text: And it had been revealed to him by the Holy Spirit
that he would not see death
before he had seen the Lord's Christ.
